mapper.select: SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , NULL AS file_url_list , T.hope_method , T.hope_location , T.hope_address , T.hope_location_latitude , T.hope_location_longitude , T.created_at FROM TRADE T WHERE id = #{tradeId}

SELECT TI.id AS trade_item_id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.type , TI.status , TI.created_at , TI.updated_at , TI.sales_item_id , GI_S.name AS sales_item_name , TI.sales_count , TI.sales_current_count , TI.sales_price , TI.exchange_give_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_give_item_name , TI.exchange_want_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_want_item_name FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_S ON GI_S.id = TI.sales_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TI.exchange_give_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TI.exchange_want_item_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} ORDER BY TI.id ASC

SELECT id , gacha_id , user_id , type , status , title , content , file_id , hope_method , hope_location , hope_address , hope_location_latitude , hope_location_longitude , created_at , updated_at FROM TRADE WHERE id = #{tradeId}
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId} AND status = 'APPROVED' )
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT T.id AS trade_id , T.gacha_id , T.user_id , '' AS user_nickname , T.type , T.status , T.title , T.content , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , T.hope_method , T.hope_location , T.hope_address , T.hope_location_latitude , T.hope_location_longitude , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_SUGGEST WHERE trade_id = T.id AND status != 'CANCELED') AS suggest_count , T.created_at FROM TRADE T WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
